system.availability:
Gain +10 to Perception Tests to spot or avoid being suprised, and Survival Tests to track the relevent foe on the battlefield
Kill Markers can't be acquired, only earned.
system.cost: Informal Kill Marker: Squad has Completed one Full Campaign against, or slain 75 of a particular foe. Such as Orks, Rebels, Dark Eldar, Chaos Worshippers, Kroot, Etc.
